name: hypercube
browserslist: > 0.5%, Firefox ESR, not dead, not IE > 0, not IE_Mob > 0, not safari < 7, not kaios > 0

scripts.lint: yarn run prettier && yarn run eslint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run prettier:fix && yarn run eslint:fix
scripts.test:watch: yarn run webpack -- --watch & yarn run test-loud -- --watch --verbose false
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16000 && yarn run nearley && node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --config webpack.prod.js --progress
scripts.start: yarn run nearley && yarn run nodemon & yarn run webpack-dev-server & yarn run webpack -- --watch
scripts.setup: yarn run nearley && yarn run webpack -- --progress && node --max-old-space-size=4096 force_update.js
